title: Love River Kid, Taizo

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -At the end of each Full Moon, you will call an Ally to help you and you will leave the battlefield. Practically, your role will change into **Love River Warrior, Akihiko**, if it hasnt already.

desc:
Post 1573
*Haha! It's GAME OVER for you!*
*The "Love River" is a group of 4 vigilantes that dont quite agree with the Town's way of enacting justice, but also condemn evils in their own way.*
